komunitinIs: Komunitin is an open source platform that offers social currency management for group communities.
alreadyRegisteredToALocalGroup: Already registered to a local group?
findGroupNearby: Find an group network near you and start using social currency
orSelectCountry: or select a country to find it
findComunnity: Find your community and start participating.
enableNotificationsText: Enable notifications to be aware of movements in your account and important news in your network. You can configure or disable them later.
deniedNotificationsText: This device blocks our notifications. You may allow notifications from Komunitin in your browser settings.
incompatibleNotificationsText: This device doesn't support web push notifications. If you're on Safari you may update to version 16.4.
enableLocationText: Let Komunitin know your location so it can sort network resources based on proximity.
deniedLocationText: This device blocks access to your location so Komunitin can't sort resources by proximity. You may fix that in your browser settings.
transactionPayerHint: The account of person or entity that makes the payment.
transactionPayeeHint: El compte de la persona o entitat que rep el pagament.
transactionDescriptionHint: Brief description of the concept of the sale, for example '2kg of potatoes'.
invalidAmount: Invalid amount. Enter a positive number.
transactionCommitted: The transaction has been successfully committed
transactionPending: The transaction is pending approval from the payer
transactionRejected: The transaction has been rejected and will not be applied
needFormHelpText: Fill the details of your new need.
uploadNeedImagesHint: Adding a picture to a need makes it more attractive
title: Title
needDescriptionHint: Provide here all the details for other members to understand your need
needCategoryHint: Select the category that best describes your need
needExpirationDateHint: The date when your need will expire
needDescriptionRequired: Explain your need with some detail
needPublishedHint: Make this need visible to other members
deleteNeed: Do you want to delete the need {name}?
offerFormHelpText: Fill the details of your new offer.
uploadOfferImagesHint: Adding some pictures to an offer makes it more attractive
offerCategoryHint: Select the category that best describes your offer
offerTitleHint: A short title for your offer
offerDescriptionHint: Provide here all the details for other members to understand your offer
offerDescriptionRequired: Explain your offer with some detail
offerPriceHint: Enter just a number eg '10', or '15 Â¤/hour', or anything like 'depends on piece' or 'contact-me'
offerExpirationDateHint: The date when your offer will expire
offerPublishedHint: Make this offer visible to other members
deleteOffer: Do you want to delete the offer {name}?
acceptPaymentsHint: When this option is enabled, payments to other accounts will be automatically accepted. Otherwise, you will have to accept them manually.
notificationsSettingsText: Configure the push notifications you receive in your devices.
myAccountNotificationsHint: Receive notifications about movements in your account: payments, pending transactions, expired offers and needs...
editProfileHelpText: Fill the details of your profile as you want other members to see you.
name: Name
nameHint: Your full name or organization name as you want other members to see you
bioHint: A brief description of yourself or your organization
emailHint: Your email to log in and receive important notifications. Use the buton below to change it.
changePasswordText: Enter your current password and the new one you want to use.
oldPasswordHint: Enter your current password to confirm this action
newPasswordHint: Your new password must be at least 8 characters long
changeEmailText: Enter your current password and the new email you want to use from now on.
emailChangeHint: Your email must be valid and not already in use by another user
emailChanged: Your email has been changed to {email}.
resetPasswordText: Enter your email and we will send you a link to reset your password.
resetLinkSentText: We have sent you an email with a link to reset your password. Check your inbox and follow the instructions.
membershipTermsText: Please read carefully the terms of membership in this group and accept them to continue.
signupCredentialsText: Enter your name, email and set a password to create your account. You'll need to verify the email.
signupVerifyEmailText: We have sent you an email with a link to verify your email. Check your inbox and follow the instructions.
signupCompleteText: You have completed the signup process to the group {group}. Now your registration is pending approval by the group administrators. You will receive an email when you account is fully activated.
signupCompleteText2: Meanwhile you can complete your profile and improve your offers.
emailInUse: This email is already in use. If you want to register a new account, choose another email. If you want to recover the password for the existing account, go to the login page and click on 'Forgot password?'.
inactiveAccountBannerText: Your account is inactive. You can't make transactions or see other members offers and needs until your account is activated by the group administrators.
emailsSettingsText: Configure the emails you receive in your inbox.
myAccountEmailsHint: Emails related to your account: payments, pending transactions, expired offers and needs...
groupEmailsHint: Compilation of latest group news: new members, new offers and needs...
createTransactionText: Fill the following fields to create a transaction that will transfer some amount between two accounts.
sendPaymentText: Select the member you want to pay, a description and the amount you will transfer from your account.
receivePaymentText: Select the member who will pay you, a description and the amount you will receive to your account.
chooseAccountNoListingText: Type the account code in the external group '{group}'. You can also use the code scanner feature to read the transfer.
enterMultipleTransactionsText: Fill the following fields to create multiple transfers sequentially. You can also load them from a CSV file.
copyDescription: Use the same description for all transfers
importFileText: Select a CSV (Comma Separated Values) file with the transactions to import. The file must have exactly 4 columns in order: Payer, Payee, Description, Amount. The column Amount must be a number without any symbol and must be expressed in your currency unit. The app will discard the first row if it contains headers. You can create the file with a spreadsheet program.
errorInRows: There are errors in the following rows: {rows}
transactionsPending: {num} transactions are pending approval by the payer
transactionsRejected: {num} transactions have been rejected and won't be applied
enterTransactionDataQR: Set a description and an amount to build the transaction QR code.
scanThisQR: Scan this QR code with the app to make the transfer
nfcTagsText: Convert any NFT tag into a digital wallet linked to your account.
deleteNFCTagConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the NFC tag with name {name}?
nfcTagHint: Tap to start scanning. If using a phone, the reader is in the back.
noTags: There are no NFC tags associated to your account yet.
enterTransactionDataNfc: Set a transfer description and an amount before scanning the NFC tag.
bringNfcTag: Bring the NFC tag close to the device to scan it.
deleteAccountText: Completely delete your account and delete all your data in this platform inlcuding your profile, offers, needs and your account. You need to have a positive or zero balance to delete your account, contact your administrator otherwise.
deleteAccountConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action will delete all your data forever in the platform and you won't be able to log again in after that. If you account has positive balance, it will be moved to the selected account.
moveBalanceToHint: Select the account where your balance will be moved before deleting your account
acceptExternalPaymentsAutomaticallyHint: Automatically accept all external payment requests.
newGroupText: Fill the following fields to request the creation of a new group in this server. If you want to create an account in an existing group, go back to 'Find your local group'. Don't request a new group just for testing, as you can use the demo site. Please read the documentation before applying. By clicking the submit button you accept the terms of use of this service. The request will be reviewed by the administrators and it will be rejected if it is not complete and correct. Be sure to set a clear description and add all means of contact. After the group is created, you will be the administrator and you will be able to setup the settings of the currency, as well as accept other members to join.
groupCodeHint: 4 uppercase letter code. It is used to identify your group and currency in the system. It can't be changed after creation.
descriptionHint: Briefly describe your group. What is the influence area, main goals, desired impact, governance model, singularities, etc.
editCurrencyText: Define the main attributes of your currency.
codeTaken: This code is already in use
newGroupRequestedText: Your request for the new group {name} has been sent and it will be manually reviewed. You will receive an email when it is activated and you can start configuring it. If you don't receive any response in a few days, please contact the team.
dailyVolumeText: Sum of all transactions in the last 24 hours
monthlyVolumeText: Sum of all transactions in the last 30 days
yearlyVolumeText: Sum of all transactions in the last 365 days
allTimeVolumeText: Sum of all transactions since the group was created
volumeChartText: Sum of all transactions over the selected period
activeAccountsChartText: Accounts with at least one transaction over the selected period
ErrorPositionPermisionDenied: Error: Permision denied while trying to get your position
ErrorNotificationsPermissionDenied: Error: Permission denied while trying to subscribe to push notifications
ErrorBadRequest: Error: Data validation failed in server
ErrorNoTrustPath: Transaction failed because there is no exchange path between the two currencies
ErrorInvalidTransfersCSVFileLineColumn: Error parsing the CSV file in line {line} column {column}
ErrorCamNotAllowed: The app does not have permission to use the camera. You can allow it in the browser settings.
ErrorCamNotFound: No camera found in this device
ErrorCamNotReadable: Could not read camera. Maybe it is being used by another app.
ErrorNFCUnavailable: Web NFC is not available in your system. Currently only Chrome in Android is supported.
